title: LMImageLookup
description: Top level collection returned by the LMImage lookup API.

results.title: Results
results.description: List of LM images matching the query.

LMImage.title: LMImage
LMImage.description: A color depth image of a single channel of an LM image stack.

id.title: Id
id.description: The unique identifier for this image.

libraryName.title: Libraryname
libraryName.description: Name of the image library containing this image.

publishedName.title: Publishedname
publishedName.description: Published name for the contents of this image. This is not a unique identifier.

imageURL.title: Imageurl
imageURL.description: Path to a PNG version of the image. Relative to imageryBaseURL in the config.json.

thumbnailURL.title: Thumbnailurl
thumbnailURL.description: Path of a PNG thumbnail of the image. Relative to thumbnailsBaseURLs in the config.json.

alignmentSpace.title: Alignmentspace
alignmentSpace.description: Alignment space to which this image was registered.

slideCode.title: Slidecode
slideCode.description: Unique identifier for the sample that was imaged.

objective.title: Objective
objective.description: Magnification of the microscope objective used to imaged this image.

mountingProtocol.title: Mountingprotocol
mountingProtocol.description: Description of the protocol used to mount the sample for imaging.

anatomicalArea.title: Anatomicalarea
anatomicalArea.description: Anatomical area of the sample that was imaged.

channel.title: Channel
channel.description: Channel index within the full LM image stack.
